extendedInfo.description: DRAGON BALL BATTERY WIDGET represents the battery level of your smartphone with the image of a character from the manga serie. Depending on the level of your battery, the character will appear in a different transformation.DRAGON BALL BATTERY WIDGET won't drain your battery, since it only plays its role.The general methods below can be used to add Dragon Ball Battery Widget to your home screen:* Method 1:Press Home button followed by Menu button. Select Add-> Widgets-> Dragon Ball Battery Widget.* Method 2:Press Home button to show the home screen. Tap and hold your finger on any available space, then select Widgets-> Dragon Ball Battery Widget.(For further information about how to install a widget, read the instructions of your mobile phone)If you find any problem or bug in this app or want me to include a new feature, you can contact me through this email: fedapp.contact@gmail.comPlease, rate this app to continue improving it.Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/fedappmobileAdd us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fedapp-Mobile/313957198718903keywordswidget, battery, bateria, dragon ball, dragon ball z, dragon, bola de dragon, goku, vegeta, saiyan, super saiyan, sayan, super sayan

reviews.title: Love this widget!
reviews.comment: Amazing widget! If there was a way to fix the back key to be able to close the app it would be great! Over all great! Keep the updates coming!

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Love it. Every Dragonball Z fan must downloaded this. great images, great transformations and really easy to use.

reviews.title: Great app

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Super simple, great illustrations, the transformation idea is awesome. Suggestion: What if it made the super saiyan ki sound when the charger is plugged? 5 stars anyway.

reviews.title: I love this app dude

reviews.comment: You need to find a way to close the app with the back button. Other than that it\'s great!

reviews.title: For all DBZ fans
reviews.comment: I have to say, this widget is amazing! Definitely like the selection and of course, the transformations of all the characters. If you guys can make a live wallpaper out of this that would be amazing!! Just a little suggestion for the future.

reviews.title: Its a cool little accesory
reviews.comment: I love that I can use my favorite characters to see my battery. The lifetime usually is pretty close ghost ut once and a while its like yah uhuh right my battery at 19% is gonna last me 16 more hours but its a good little app

reviews.title: Love the new update
